title: Prince Harry wipes Archie's dribble in adorable unseen moment

Prince Harry was seen wiping away baby Archie's dribble in an adorable previously-unseen moment during a new documentary.

The Duke and Duchess of Sussex gave the public a rare glimpse of their cute son at a royal engagement in South Africa during Harry and Meghan: An African Journey.

They introduced their four-month-old son to Archbishop Desmond Tutu and his daughter, Thandeka Tutu-Gxashe at a tea party in September.

Thandeka could be heard laughing as smiling Archie giggled while his dad tried to wipe the dribble away from his mouth.

"I think he knows exactly what's going on," admitted Harry, who reveals his son has developed an adorable personality.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Speaking after the meeting, Meghan Markle said: "It's a lot with a five-month-old. Life is [tiring] but I think any parent can relate to that. He’s been doing really well. He’s been sleeping really well.

"It's not lost on us what a huge and significant moment this is. I think Archie will look back on that in so many years and realise at the beginning of his life he was fortunate enough to have that moment with one of the most inspirational leaders of our time."

Once finished speaking with ITV News anchor Tom Bradby, Meghan walked over to Harry, who is holding their sleepy son in his arms.

She tenderly kissed Archie on the head ands stroked him in the adorable moment which was captured by cameras.

During a dinner party, Meghan admitted Archie was "happiest" in South Africa and had been finding his voice on the trip.

In agreement, Harry reveals that Archie has been smiling out of the window and chatting a lot while they have been away.

Meghan said: "He’s the happiest here. So chatty over the last few days."

Viewers of the documentary took to Twitter after watching the special moment.

One viewer said: "Archie is just the sweetest, what a cutie"

"Archie is adorable," added another.

A third agreed: "Baby Archie is just the cutest!"

"I just noticed that little Archie has his daddy’s sparkling eyes. What a lovely lad," said a fourth.
description: Meghan Markle explained baby Archie was finding his voice and was happiest in South Africa during Harry and Meghan: An African Journey
